markdownRemark.html:
• Responsible for the analysis, design and programming of the mobile application in Objective C for iOS
  • In charge of the development of the application for Red5 in Java
  • Construction of the bot for optimization of video, audio and images of the platform
  • Creation of multiple APIs RESTful PHP
  • In charge of the graphical interface of vlooping.com

images.title: Mobile App Development
images.description: At Vlooping I had the opportunity to work on the development of the mobile App, to use message brokers, to work with streaming servers, to know about the architecture of microservices.

images.title: Mobile App
images.description: I developed the Mobile App under the Objective-C language.

images.title: Queue
images.description: Once the video or audio streaming was finished, the message was sent through RabbitMQ to be processed by another service "Convert to different audio or video formats".
images.caption: New Message

images.title: Social network
images.description: Also, I worked in the Core of the App, specifically in the sections of feed of posts, show publications of users, I implemented the API's of Facebook, Youtube and Twitter to upload the messages "Video, audio or Text" to those platforms.

images.title: Recording Messages
images.description: Recording a message was an interesting task, from the desktop version the streaming was sent directly to Red5 Media Server.

images.title: Report Content
images.description: I developed the algorithm to block or remove content that went against the terms of use.
